name: Bello
tagline: Bello is a simple code formatting utility written in Ruby.
body:
### Welcome to Bello
Bello is a very simple code formatting utility written in Ruby. It is released under the MIT License.

### Why "Bello"?
Bello is Italian for beauty. So that's the reason Bello was picked as the name of the project. 

### Languages Supported
Bello currently supports
- Matlab

### Documentation
Bello is a brand new open sourced project. So the documentation is slowly taking shape at https://github.com/adhithyan15/bello/wiki/Bello-Documentation

### Authors and Support
This project is being maintained by **Adhithya (@adhithyan15) and Sri Madhavi Rajasekaran (@sri96)**. You can reach both of them by  email at adhithyan15 at gmail dotcom.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
